greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(m,n) = Sum_{0<i<m, 0<j<n, gcd{i,j}=1} 1, where m >= n >= 1.
link: M. A. Alekseyev, M. Basova, and N. Yu. Zolotykh. On the minimal teaching sets of two-dimensional threshold functions. SIAM Journal on Discrete Mathematics 29:1 (2015), 157-165. doi:10.1137/140978090. See Lemma 11.
maple: for i from 1 to m-1 do for j from 1 to n-1 do
if gcd(i,j)=1 then a:=a+1; fi; od: od: a; end;
for m from 1 to 12 do lprint([seq(VS(m,n),n=1..m)]); od:
mathematica: Table[Sum[Boole[# == 1] # &@ GCD[i, j], {i, m - 1}, {j, n - 1}], {m, 12}, {n, m}] // Flatten (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 12 2020 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 11 2020
